name: Panic Chamber
description:
You are trapped in a haunted school where something cursed is taking place. Will you find your way out?

Armed with basic equipment and your brain, navigate through maze-like school hallways and classrooms and escape by solving puzzles in the form of math equations.

Avoid the teacher,

and most importantly, DON'T PANIC

     

CONTROLS

WASD to move around

SPACE to jump

CTRL to crouch

SHIFT to sprint

F for flashlight

RIGHT/LEFT-CLICK to interact

With the help and guidance from our lecturers, friends, and Indian tutorials on Youtube, we present to you Panic Chamber. This game was made by ValorDudes LTD using Unreal Engine 5 with assets imported from Sketchfab.com and Quixel Bridge.

Background music: xxx

Tips and Tricks

Avoid the teacher at all costs

Only roam around the hallways when you need to find the clues

Make use of the flashlight in darker rooms

Keep an eye out for hints and clues in the main classroom
